data.title: Obituary for Cynthia Stone
data.meta_description: Obituary for Cynthia Fay (Roberts)  Stone | Cindy Stone, 55, of Goldsboro, passed away on Tuesday at her residence. She was the daughter of the late Edward and Dessie Roberts and the wife of Frank Stone. Cindy loved spending time with...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Cynthia Stone | April 4, 2023 | Dudley,NC
data.text:
Cindy Stone, 55, of Goldsboro, passed away on Tuesday at her residence. She was the daughter of the late Edward and Dessie Roberts and the wife of Frank Stone. Cindy loved spending time with her children and grandchildren and time at the beach.

The family will have a memorial service at a later date.

In addition to her husband, Cindy is survived by her children, Matt Stone(Holly) of Calypso, Ben Stone(Brittney) of La Grange, GA, Breezy Stone(Derek Mooring) of Goldsboro; a brother, Jim Roberts(Kay) of Hamilton, GA; and grandchildren, Jacob, Addisynn, Landon, Brantley, Lance, and Devin.

Shumate-Faulk Funeral Home & Crematory is serving the Stone family, and online condolences can be directed to www.shumate-faulk.com
